description: At Kyte.One, we are developing AirLyft, the most complete decentralized, multichain, growth hacking platform ever created for projects to establish, expand, and engage their community. It is a feature-rich platform to incentivize on-chain/off-chain actions by the community. AirLyft also automates the validation, reward creation as well as distribution, thereby saving hours of marketing & development effort. This platform supports Moonbeam as well as Moonriver and is ready for all projects including DeFi, GameFi, NFT Projects, & Metaverses
